message.body: Hope finals went well and u r well on ur way towards relaxation!
Oh yes relaxing I am. Today I have a yoga date followed by local asparagus (first crop at the coop) and bacon then Little Baby's icecream. ‚ù§

Do you know of anyplace within about 2 hours of Brooklyn that is beautiful for hiking/walking around? I'm in charge of planning my friend Arabella's 30th birthday and I want to find something perfect for her.

Good job w finals! Doing well. Bit sore from trail run but ok. Clinic always puts me in good mood and reminds me how good I have it too Not sure about places near Brooklyn. There has to be websites w that stuff. Esp up the ny thruway near hunter mount
Hope yoga date asparagus bacon and ice cream exceeds expectations!
I didn't know that you run, but I should have guessed. Yoga and bacon was great indeed! My friend Laura just started eating meat and had not had bacon yet! The tastiest!!
The smell can be swell as well (That rhymes.
Said it. Love it. Ironically I was trying to wash the bacon grease smell off my hands before leaving the house....
Laura is fortunate to have a friend like u
May have helped me attract a mate though who knows.
True. Bacon can do that. Sawdust might also.
